argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | strfv.s | |- S Struct X |
| 2 |  | strfv.e | |- E = Slot ( E ` ndx ) |
| 3 |  | strfv.n | |- { <. ( E ` ndx ) , C >. } C_ S |
| 4 |  | #P_brstruct | |- Rel Struct |
| 5 | 4 | #P_brrelexi | |- ( S Struct X -> S e. _V ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_ax-mp | |- S e. _V |
| 7 | 1 | #P_structfun | |- Fun `' `' S |
| 8 |  | #P_opex | |- <. ( E ` ndx ) , C >. e. _V |
| 9 | 8 | #P_snss | |- ( <. ( E ` ndx ) , C >. e. S <-> { <. ( E ` ndx ) , C >. } C_ S ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_mpbir | |- <. ( E ` ndx ) , C >. e. S |
| 11 | 6, 7, 2, 10 | #P_strfv2 | |- ( C e. V -> C = ( E ` S ) ) |
